summary: Sanjana and Aditya decide to give their marriage one last chance. They plan a holiday in Ooty, but they don't know that a strange figure is waiting for them to come.
cast: Dino Morea|Bipasha Basu|Malini Sharma|Shruti Ulfat|Anang Desai|Vishwajeet Pradhan|Ali Asgar|Mink Singh|Masood Akhtar|Pratima Kazmi|D. Siddharth|Neha Murli|Ishwar Patel|Kiran Randhawa|Ashutosh Rana|Neha Bam|Yusuf Hussain|Siddharth Ray|Murli Sharma
title: Raaz
